instructions.1: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray.
instructions.2: Whisk together egg white and water in a medium bowl until frothy.
instructions.3: Mix together sugar, salt, and cinnamon in a separate bowl.
instructions.4: Add pecans to egg white mixture; stir to coat.
instructions.5: Transfer pecans to sugar mixture; toss to coat.
instructions.6: Spread pecans out on the prepared baking sheet.
instructions.7: Bake in the preheated oven until crisp, about 1 hour; stir every 15 minutes.
